summary: SummaryETUDE Soonjung pH 5.5 Relief Toner is a low-irritant, weakly acidic toner that calms and soothes skin irritated by external stressors, restoring balance to sensitive or heated skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPH BALANCED FORMULA: Balanced at pH5.5 for healthier skin98.3% MOISTURIZING INGREDIENTS: A deeply hydrating toner composed of 98.3% moisturizing ingredients, featuring a refreshing, quick-absorbing water-based formulaFRAGRANCE-FREE: Unscented, ideal for sensitive skinKey IngredientsPanthensosideâ„¢: Panthenol (Protection of skin barrier & retains moisture, and soothes dry skin) + Madecassoside (Soothing effect for irritated skin)Formulated WithoutFree from 10 additives (Free of animal-derived ingredients, mineral oil, polyacrylamide, imidazolidinyl urea, triethanolamine, synthetic pigment, silicone oil, paraben, fragrance, PEG surfactant)Item 2636341How To UseAfter cleansing, pour an adequate amount of toner on your hand and gently pat it in.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Glycerin, Betaine, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglycerin-3, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Carbomer, Madecassoside, Butylene Glycol, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Tocopherol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.
how_to_use: After cleansing, pour an adequate amount of toner on your hand and gently pat it in.

reviews.headline: Solid toner.
reviews.comments: Im a licensed esthetician and im always looking for good skincare. This toner is a great value, good quality ingredient and its very gentle. Will be repurchasing.
